SEARCH
Package io.github.jy95.fds.common.types

Interface DosageMarkdown<A extends DosageAPI<?,B>,B>

Type Parameters:
A - The type of the DosageAPI used to convert dosage objects to human-readable text.
B - The type of the dosage object read from the JSON files.
public interface DosageMarkdown<A extends DosageAPI<?,B>,B>
An interface for generating Markdown examples of dosage information. Implementations of this interface can read dosage data from JSON files and generate human-readable Markdown documentation in multiple locales.
Since:
1.0.5
Author:
jy95

  • Method Details

    • getLocales

      default List<Locale> getLocales()
      Returns a list of locales for which Markdown examples will be generated. The default implementation provides English, French, German, and Dutch (Belgian).
      Returns:
      A list of Locale objects.

    • getResourcesDir

      default Path getResourcesDir()
      Returns the path to the resources directory containing the JSON input files. The default implementation assumes the JSON files are located in src/site/resources/examples.
      Returns:
      A Path object representing the resources directory.

    • getBaseOutputDir

      default Path getBaseOutputDir(Locale locale)
      Returns the base output directory for generated Markdown files for a specific locale. All Markdown files will be placed under this directory, potentially in subdirectories that mirror the input folder structure.
      Parameters:
      locale - The Locale for which the base output directory is being determined.
      Returns:
      A Path object representing the base output directory (e.g., src/site/en/markdown/examples).

    • createDosageAPI

      A createDosageAPI(Locale locale)
      Creates and returns a new instance of DosageAPI for the given locale. Implementers of this interface must provide a concrete implementation for this method.
      Parameters:
      locale - The Locale for which to create the DosageAPI.
      Returns:
      A new DosageAPI instance configured for the specified locale.

    • getDosageAPIs

      default Map<Locale,A> getDosageAPIs()
      Returns a map of DosageAPI instances, keyed by Locale. This default implementation uses getLocales() and createDosageAPI(Locale) to build the map.
      Returns:
      A Map where keys are Locale objects and values are DosageAPI instances configured for that locale.

    • getDosageFromJson

      List<B> getDosageFromJson(Path jsonFile) throws IOException
      Reads a dosage object of type B from the specified JSON file.
      Parameters:
      jsonFile - The Path to the JSON file containing the dosage data.
      Returns:
      The dosage object read from the JSON file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • getJsonFiles

      default Stream<Path> getJsonFiles() throws IOException
      Returns a Stream of Path objects representing all JSON files recursively found within the resources directory and its subdirectories. This method can be overridden to customize how the JSON files are located.
      Returns:
      A Stream of Path objects for the JSON files.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while traversing directories.

    • getJsonFilesGroupedByFolder

      default Map<Path,List<Path>> getJsonFilesGroupedByFolder() throws IOException
      Returns a map of JSON files grouped by their parent directory. This method uses getJsonFiles() to find all JSON files and then groups them by their containing folder.
      Returns:
      A Map where keys are Path objects representing folders, and values are List of Path objects representing JSON files within that folder.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while traversing directories.

    • generateMarkdown

      default void generateMarkdown() throws Exception
      Generates Markdown example files for all JSON files found within the subdirectories of the resources directory for each of the supported locales. The generated Markdown files will contain the original JSON input and the human-readable output produced by the DosageAPI.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during file processing or API usage.

    • getDosageJsonAsString

      default String getDosageJsonAsString(Path jsonFile) throws IOException
      Reads the content of a JSON file and returns it as a String. This method is used to read the JSON file content before processing it
      Parameters:
      jsonFile - The path to the JSON file.
      Returns:
      The content of the JSON file as a String.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.
      Since:
      1.0.6

    • escapeHtml

      default String escapeHtml(String text)
      Helper method to escape HTML special characters for safe inclusion in HTML content.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to escape.
      Returns:
      The escaped text.
